about.title: About Shenye Jinzhan
about.text1: Shenzhen Shenye Jinzhan Materials Supply Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as Shenye Jinzhan) was established in 2005, dedicated to serving high-tech industries, scientific research, and higher education fields. We are committed to building a high-level research outsourcing service platform for research facility construction and high-tech introduction, providing universities, research institutions, and high-tech enterprises with modern innovative supply chain services including pre-consulting, procurement agency execution, duty refund consulting and agency, supply chain settlement services, equipment authentication, and cross-border logistics.
about.text2: Over the past 20 years, we have imported cutting-edge research equipment and advanced production lines worth over 10 billion RMB for hundreds of universities, research institutions, and R&D companies nationwide.

stats.coverage:
Shenzhen University Coverage
95%

service1.title: Import/Export Agency Services
service1.description: One-stop solution for procurement and sales order execution, import/export permit agency, customs declaration and inspection, foreign exchange collection and verification, making your cross-border trade efficient and worry-free.

service2.title: Supply Chain Financing
service2.description: Providing procurement fund advance, bill purchase, and letter of credit services to inject financial vitality into your supply chain, alleviate funding pressure, and boost efficient business operations.

service3.title: Import/Export Tax Consulting
service3.description: Providing scheme design, duty-free processing, and equipment classification services. We professionally control policy points to help you reduce costs compliantly and advance business efficiently.

service4.title: Integrated Logistics Services
service4.description: Providing Shenzhen-Hong Kong and international transportation, chartering and booking, warehousing and distribution, and transit customs clearance services. Full-chain logistics assurance to efficiently open your cross-border logistics channels.

service5.title: Offshore Outsourcing & Value-Added Services
service5.description: Providing offshore outsourcing, cargo insurance and claims, temporary import/export, and duty-free cargo supervision services. Full empowerment for cross-border business with compliant and efficient operations.

service6.title: Pre-Bid Consulting
service6.description: Providing full-process consulting services including bid policy interpretation, qualification assessment, regulatory consulting, and bidding scheme design to help complete bidding projects compliantly and efficiently.

special.title: Our Advantages

item1.title: Comprehensive Supply Chain Service System
item1.description: Covering pre-bid consulting, procurement agency execution, duty refund consulting and agency, supply chain settlement services, equipment authentication, and cross-border logistics – solving complex customer needs across all links.

item2.title: Deep Industry Expertise
item2.description: Accumulated profound experience in specialized fields such as research, education, and healthcare, precisely matching the professional and compliance requirements of public procurement.

item3.title: Global Resource Integration
item3.description: Long-term close cooperation with 100+ international brand manufacturers, ensuring the quality and timeliness of equipment and consumable supplies.

item4.title: Emergency Response Mechanism
item4.description: Providing rapid deployment and flexible service support for urgent needs such as laboratory spare parts and consumables.

item5.title: Industry-Academia-Research Collaboration
item5.description: Promoting technical cooperation and resource sharing between scientific research institutions and enterprises through supply chain services, accelerating the industrialization of innovation achievements.
